hero.heading: Welcome to the CATA Resource Hub.
body: This hub centralizes information for our studios, labs, and classrooms.
You’ll find policies, how-to guides, and shared resources to support your work in the Music Production & Recording Arts and related programs.

contact.title: Need help?
contact.body: If you’re stuck, have a question about the studios, or something isn’t working the way you expect, please reach out.
